attributes.comment:
I am against the proposed increase fees. This has a major impact of hard working
lower middle class families that are in the process of International Adoption. We
should encourage helping the adoptive families bring home their children, not slap
more fees on them. The services, red tape and turn around times do not warrant
increasing the fees. I could understand if the service you provided were stellar and
fast, for the most part many of your CIS departments are slow and service for a
I161 approval is in excess of 90 days. Much termoil for a family waiting to bring
home a baby thats sitting in an orphange overseas.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Kim Ortiz
